Directory: preprocessing/

.pro files

hiihat_get_neutral_region.pro

Detects a neutral spectrum within the given image and creates a ratio image by dividing out the detected spectrum.

hiihat_preprocess.pro

Perform preprocesing steps for a set of known image formats
